document.full_text: workers involved in mustard-gas production during the world war ii era showed heightened odds of lung cancer at a relatively young age -- with the excess risk fading in old age, a new study finds.
document.title: working with mustard gas linked to lung cancer
lines_and_colors: workers involved in mustard-gas production during the world war ii era showed heightened odds of lung cancer at a relatively young age -- with the excess risk fading in old age, a new study finds.
